00025 #define U_ADD_ARGS  100 
00026 #define U_MAX_ARGS 8192

00028 class U_EXPORT UCommand {

00040         void zero()
00041                 {
00042                 envp = 0;
00043                 pathcmd = 0;
00044                 ncmd = nenv = nfile = 0;
00045                 argv_exec = envp_exec = 0;
00046                 }
00047 
00048         UCommand()
00049                 {
00050                 U_TRACE_REGISTER_OBJECT(0, UCommand, "", 0)
00051 
00052                 zero();
00053                 }
00054 
00055         UCommand(const UString& cmd, char** penv) : command(cmd)
00056                 {
00057                 U_TRACE_REGISTER_OBJECT(0, UCommand, "%.*S,%p", U_STRING_TO_TRACE(cmd), penv)
00058 
00059                 zero();
00060                 setCommand();
00061                 setEnvironment(penv);
00062                 }
00063 
00064         UCommand(const UString& cmd, const UString* penv = 0) : command(cmd)
00065                 {
00066                 U_TRACE_REGISTER_OBJECT(0, UCommand, "%.*S,%p", U_STRING_TO_TRACE(cmd), penv)
00067 
00068                 zero();
00069                 setCommand();
00070                 setEnvironment(penv);
00071                 }
00072 
00073         ~UCommand()
00074                 {
00075                 U_TRACE_UNREGISTER_OBJECT(0, UCommand)
00076 
00077                 freeCommand();
00078                 freeEnvironment();
00079                 }

00081         // MANAGE GENERIC ENVIRONMENT

00083         void setEnvironment(char** penv)
00084                 {
00085                 U_TRACE(0, "UCommand::setEnvironment(%p)", penv)
00086 
00087                 setEnvironment((const UString*)0);
00088 
00089                 envp = penv;
00090                 }

00092         void setEnvironment(const UString* env);

00094         // MANAGE GENERIC ARGUMENT
00095 
00096         void delArgument()
00097                 {
00098                 U_TRACE(0, "UCommand::delArgument()")
00099 
00100                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(argv_exec)
00101 
00102                 argv_exec[ncmd--] = 0;
00103 
00104                 U_INTERNAL_DUMP("ncmd = %d", ncmd)
00105 
00106                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_RANGE(1,ncmd,U_ADD_ARGS)
00107                 }
00108 
00109         void addArgument(const char* argument)
00110                 {
00111                 U_TRACE(0, "UCommand::addArgument(%S)", argument)
00112 
00113                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(argv_exec)
00114 
00115                 argv_exec[++ncmd] = (char*) argument;
00116                 argv_exec[ncmd+1] = 0;
00117 
00118                 U_INTERNAL_DUMP("ncmd = %d", ncmd)
00119 
00120                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_RANGE(1,ncmd,U_ADD_ARGS)
00121                 }
00122 
00123         void setArgument(int n, const char* argument)
00124                 {
00125                 U_TRACE(0, "UCommand::setArgument(%d,%S)", n, argument)
00126 
00127                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_RANGE(2,n,ncmd)
00128                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(argv_exec)
00129 
00130                 argv_exec[n] = (char*) argument;
00131                 }
00132 
00133         void setLastArgument(const char* argument)
00134                 {
00135                 U_TRACE(0, "UCommand::setLastArgument(%S)", argument)
00136 
00137                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(argv_exec)
00138                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_EQUALS(argv_exec[ncmd+1],0)
00139 
00140                 argv_exec[ncmd] = (char*) argument;
00141                 }
00142 
00143         void setNumArgument(int32_t n = 1, bool bfree = false);
00144 
00145         // MANAGE FILE ARGUMENT
00146 
00147         void setFileArgument();
00148         void setFileArgument(const char* pathfile)
00149                 {
00150                 U_TRACE(0, "UCommand::setFileArgument(%S)", pathfile)
00151 
00152                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(argv_exec)
00153 
00154                 U_INTERNAL_DUMP("ncmd = %d", ncmd)
00155 
00156                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_RANGE(2,nfile,ncmd)
00157 
00158                 argv_exec[nfile] = (char*) pathfile;
00159                 }

00164         int32_t getNumFileArgument() const       { return nfile; }

00167         UString getStringEnvironment()           { return environment; }

00169         void setCommand(const UString& cmd)
00170                 {
00171                 U_TRACE(0, "UCommand::setCommand(%.*S)", U_STRING_TO_TRACE(cmd))
00172 
00173                 command = cmd;
00174 
00175                 setCommand();
00176                 }

00178         void set(const UString& cmd, char** penv)
00179                 {
00180                 U_TRACE(0, "UCommand::set(%.*S,%p)", U_STRING_TO_TRACE(cmd), penv)

00193 
00194         void freeCommand();
00195         void freeEnvironment()
00196                 {
00197                 U_TRACE(0, "UCommand::freeEnvironment()")
00198 
00199                 if (envp_exec)
00200                         {
00201                         U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_MAJOR(nenv, 0)
00202 
00203                         // NB: considera null terminator...
00204 
00205                         U_FREE_VECTOR(envp_exec, nenv+1,        char);
00206                         }
00207                 }
00208 
00209         void reset(const UString& cmd, const UString& env)
00210                 {
00211                 U_TRACE(0, "UCommand::reset(%.*S,%.*S)", U_STRING_TO_TRACE(cmd), U_STRING_TO_TRACE(env))
00212 
00213                 freeCommand();
00214                 freeEnvironment();
00215 
00216                 command         = cmd;
00217                 environment = env;
00218 
00219                 zero();
00220                 }
00221 
00222         bool isShellScript() const
00223                 {
00224                 U_TRACE(0, "UCommand::isShellScript()")
00225 
00226                 U_ASSERT(command.empty() == false)
00227 
00228                 bool result = (strncmp(command.data(), U_PATH_SHELL-1) == 0);
00229 
00230                 U_RETURN(result);
00231                 }
00232 
00233         char*   getCommand() const
00234                 {
00235                 U_TRACE(0, "UCommand::getCommand()")
00236 
00237                 char* result = argv_exec[(isShellScript() ? 2 : 0)];
00238 
00239                 U_RETURN(result);
00240                 }

00245         static int timeoutMS; // specified the timeout value, in milliseconds for read output. A negative value indicates no timeout, i.e. an infinite wait.
00246         static int exit_value;

00249         bool execute(UString* input, UString* output, int fd_stdin = -1, int fd_stderr = -1);

00254 
00255         bool checkForExecute(int mode = R_OK | X_OK)
00256                 {
00257                 U_TRACE(1, "UCommand::checkForExecute(%d)", mode)
00258 
00259                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(argv_exec)
00260 
00261                 bool result = (U_SYSCALL(access, "%S,%d", argv_exec[0], mode) == 0);
00262 
00263                 U_RETURN(result);
00264                 }

00266         // MANAGE MESSAGE ERROR
00267 
00268         static bool isStarted()
00269                 {
00270                 U_TRACE(0, "UCommand::isStarted()")
00271 
00272                 bool result = (pid > 0);
00273 
00274                 U_RETURN(result);
00275                 }
00276 
00277         static bool isTimeout()
00278                 {
00279                 U_TRACE(0, "UCommand::isTimeout()")
00280 
00281                 bool result = (exit_value == -EAGAIN);
00282 
00283                 U_RETURN(result);
00284                 }

00286         static void printMsgError()
00287                 {
00288                 U_TRACE(0, "UCommand::printMsgError()")
00289 
00290                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_MAJOR(u_buffer_len, 0)
00291 
00292                 U_WARNING("%.*s", u_buffer_len, u_buffer);
00293 
00294                 u_buffer_len = 0;
00295                 }
